results.title: Phenelzine and atenolol in social phobia.
results.text_hl: Seventy-four @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ meeting @<m>DISEASE_Rufous_oculocutaneous_albinism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537189 @@@DSM-III@@@ criteria for @DISEASE_Phobia_Social @DISEASE_MESH:D000072861 @@@social phobia@@@ completed 4 or more weeks of double-blind, randomized treatment with the monoamine oxidase inhibitor @CHEMICAL_Phenelzine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010624 @@@phenelzine@@@, the cardioselective beta-adrenergic blocker @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, or placebo.

citations.NLM: Liebowitz MR, Schneier F, Campeas R, Gorman J, Fyer A, Hollander E, Hatterer J, Papp L. Phenelzine and atenolol in social phobia. Psychopharmacol Bull. 1990;26(1):123-5. PMID: 2196620
